title: Growing Corn Basics Time Lapse - 6 days

tasks.task: Driving a 4WD vehicle through a field with crops
subtasks: Sitting in the driver's seat of the 4WD vehicle
Applying proper steering techniques to navigate through the field
Adjusting speed to approximately 6.0-6.8 KPH
Observing the crops to monitor growth or field conditions
Maintaining control of the vehicle on uneven or muddy terrain
Holding the crop sensor while walking through the field
Tilting the sensor to the appropriate angle for accurate readings
Moving the sensor across the crop rows at a consistent speed
Noting the color or signals from the sensor to assess crop needs
Walking through the field between rows
Checking for weeds, pests, or other issues in the crops
Identifying areas needing attention, such as yellowing or stunted plants
Deciding on the appropriate action to take for problem areas

tasks.task: Setting up a hose or irrigation system
subtasks: Walking to the location of the irrigation system
Connecting the hose to the irrigation system
Adjusting the hose to direct water towards the necessary crop areas
Ensuring proper water distribution to the crops
Wearing appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE)
Assembling the sprayer according to the manufacturer's instructions
Filling the sprayer with the appropriate solution or pesticide
Adjusting the nozzle or pressure settings for the crop type
Walking through the field, applying the solution均匀ly to the crops
Monitoring the sprayer for proper functioning and no leaks
Checking the status of all field equipment before operation
Ensuring the equipment is properly secured and ready for use
Observing other workers or equipment in the vicinity to avoid collisions
Stopping the equipment promptly if a hazard is observed

tasks.task: Performing light maintenance on field tools
subtasks: Inspecting tools for any wear or damage
Lubricating moving parts as needed
Tightening loose bolts or screws
Replacing parts that are worn or damaged
